description: This file defines the AppScaffold class, which extends Android's Application class and serves as the initialization entry point for the shopping app. It manages global app state, configuration variables, and setup routines.

classes.name: AppScaffold
classes.description: A custom Application class serving as the app-wide initialization point and providing access to shared resources and configuration.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the base URL for API calls, fetched from BuildConfig at runtime.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the Application instance and performs setup routines when the application starts.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Provides a singleton instance of AppScaffold for global access.
